PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^7Eye of Winter Saboteur (Miner) - How to Level
^xAF6025Hillock:^7
Stormblast Mines + Chance to Poison - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7
^xAF6025Hailrake:^7
Stormblast Mines + Swift Assembly - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7
Frostblink + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70B^7
Frostbomb + Onslaught - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7
Orb of Storms - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^7
^xB97123Brutus:^7
Stormblast Mines + Swift Assembly + Added Lightning Damage - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7
Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFBB^7^7
Frostbomb + Onslaught - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7
Orb of Storms -^x3F6DB3 ^x7070FFB^7^7
^xB97123Chamber of Sins (Act 2): ^7
Stormblast Mines + Swift Assembly + Added Lightning Damage - ^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7
Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x7070FFBB^7
Frostbomb + Onslaught - ^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7
Orb of Storms - ^x7070FFB^7
Skitterbots - ^x7070FFB^7
Herald of Thunder - ^x7070FFB^7 (Drop this if you are having mana issues)
^xAF6025Bandits: ^7
^xD02090Help Alira^7^7^x7070FF
^xB97123Vaal Oversoul:^7
Stormblast Mines + Swift Assembly + Added Lightning Damage - ^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7
Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x7070FFBB^7
Orb of Storms + Onslaught + Elemental Focus - ^x7070FFBB^7^x3F6DB3^x70FF70G^7^x70FF70
^7Skitterbots - ^x7070FFB^7
Herald of Thunder - ^x7070FFB^7 (Drop this if you are having mana issues)^7
Wave of Conviction - ^x7070FFB^7 (Use this for Single Target)
^xAF6025^xE05030VERY IMPORTANT TO DO YOUR WAND CRAFT AT THIS POINT - HERE'S THE RECIPE:^7^7 1 Orb of Alteration 1 Magic Wand 1 RARE Topaz Ring
^xB97123Maramoa (Act 3):^7
Conductivity - ^x7070FFB^7 (Add it anywhere in your gear - used for Single Target)
^xB97123Crystal Veins Waypoint - Act 4: ^7
^xE05030THIS IS WHEN YOU WANT TO DO YOUR FIRST LAB & ALSO WHERE YOU WILL BE BECOMING AN ACTUAL MINER!^7
^xD02090Ascendancy Order: Pyromaniac -> Bomb Specialist -> Demolitions Specialist -> Exposives Expert for DAMAGE or Born in the Shadows for DEFENSE^7
Arc + Blastchain Mines + Swift Assembly + Elemental Focus - ^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7^x7070FFB^7
Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x7070FFBB^7
Wave of Conviction + Added Lightning Damage + Onslaught - ^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7
Skitterbots - ^x7070FFB^7
Herald of Thunder - ^x7070FFB^7 (Drop this if you are having mana issues)^7
Conductivity - ^x7070FFB^7 (Add it anywhere in your gear - used for Single Target)
^xAF6025Clearing the Strand - Act 6: ^7
^xE05030AT THIS POINT YOU UNLOCK "LILLY" TO SELL YOU ALL THE GEMS IN THE GAME^7
Arc + Blastchain Mines + Swift Assembly + Elemental Focus - ^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7^x7070FFB^7
Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x7070FFBB^7
Wave of Conviction + Hextouch Support + Conductivity - ^x7070FFBBB^7 (put this down for single target)
Skitterbots - ^x7070FFB^7
Herald of Thunder - ^x7070FFB^7 (Drop this if you are having mana issues)^7
^xD02090Purchase Eye of Winter and Level it in your Offhand!^7
^xAF6025^xE05030YOU WILL USE THE SETUP ABOVE ALL THE WAY UP TO MAPS - AT WHICH POINT YOU CAN TRANSITION INTO EYE OF WINTER^7^7
